content: turn round 3 knit odd row 3 - 13 sl1 k6 ssk turn round 5 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 66 72 sts even row 4 - 14 p8 turn round 6 *k5 sl1 repeat from * to end of round row 15 sl1 k6 ssk do not turn size l only for size m - skip to round 7 repeat row 1 - 15 11 12 x on last repeat turn p8 round a knit part v - right slanting blocks round b *k5 sl1 repeat from * to end of round work the same as part iii - right slanting blocks both sizes round 7 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 55 60 sts part vi - left slanting blocks round 8 *k4 sl1 repeat from * to end of round note skip the topmost edge st on the previous block when picking up sts size l only for size m - skip to round 9 row 1 pu 7 sts along edge sl last pu st to lh needle ssk turn round c knit row 2 sl1 p6 turn round d *k4 sl1 repeat from * to end of round odd row 3 - 13 sl1 k5 ssk turn both sizes even row 4 - 14 p7 turn round 9 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 44 48 sts row 15 sl1 k5 ssk do not turn round 10 *k3 sl1 repeat from * to end of round repeat row 1 - 15 11 12 x on last repeat turn p7 = 77 84 sts round 11 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 33 36 sts part vii - right slanting blocks round 12 *k2 sl1 repeat from * to end of round note skip topmost edge st on previous block when picking up sts round 13 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 22 24 sts row 1 pu 7 sts along edge sl last pu st to lh needle p2tog turn round 14 *k1 sl1 repeat from * to end of round row 2 sl1 k6 turn round 15 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round = 11 12 sts odd row 3 - 11 sl1 p5 p2tog turn break yarn and draw through remaining sts twice even row 4 - 12 k7 turn finishing row 13 sl1 p5 p2tog do not turn weave in ends blocking is not necessary repeat row 1 - 13 11 12 x on last repeat turn k7 abbreviations part viii - top triangles approx approximate ly row 1 pu 7 sts along edge sl last pu st to lh needle ssk turn co cast on row 2 sl1 p5 wrap & turn k knit row 3 k5 ssk turn k2tog knit 2 stitches together row 4 p5 wrap & turn lh left hand row 5 k4 ssk turn p purl row 6 p4 wrap & turn pu pick
